scripts.test: npm run make-env npm && npm run make-config && LOG_LEVEL=0 gulp test
scripts.make-env: node -e 'var fs = require("fs"); if(!fs.existsSync("./dot.env")) { var rs = fs.createReadStream("./dot-EXAMPLE.env"); var ws = fs.createWriteStream("dot.env"); rs.pipe(ws); }'
scripts.make-config: node -e 'var fs = require("fs"); if(!fs.existsSync("./config.json")) { var rs = fs.createReadStream("./example.config.json"); var ws = fs.createWriteStream("config.json"); rs.pipe(ws); }'
